Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this remarkable item at a special introductory price of $950,000. This offer is designed to ensure that you receive the best possible value while securing this high-quality asset for your use. Should you choose to accept this offer, we promise a seamless transaction process and dedicated support throughout the entire experience. We look forward to the possibility of working with you and delivering this outstanding product to your doorstep. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. Sincerely, [Your Name] on behalf of [Your Company] 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $950,000.

(2) Reject Alice's offer
